a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball III

p.k: The Lie / The Butterfly / The Question The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because itâ€™s January so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe.
